If your frontend codebase is large and unwieldy, you won‚Äôt be able to quickly respond to the needs of your users. By using #microfrontends on top of a #microservice architecture, you can grant control teams who can update iteratively and independently from the rest of your app.

How to identify MFEs -> Horizontal vs Vertical split

Explore the technological impact of micro-frontends in your organization. Learn how to identify, generate, and orchestrate #microfrontends. Identify areas of an application UI that individual teams can handle. Take this #QConPlus workshop @lucamezzalira: https://t.co/sA4KKmFV63 https://t.co/vDRFkyYU8B

By giving autonomy to individual development teams, you enable them to set their own schedules for releases for iterative updates and feature experimentation.
